titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to discharge of indebtedness income from prepayment of loans under section 306B of the Rural Electrification Act of 1936.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6134)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/19/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the discharge of indebtedness income from the prepayment of certain rural electrification loans.
